thorathuru thakshana wishaya labana wasare sita hayawani shreniya sita uganwana bawa adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana mahatha pawasiya.ee mahatha ese pawasuwe ikuthdina homagama maha widyalaye shrawanagaraye pawathi adhyapana podu sahathika pathra samanya pela samath duppath lamayin siya deneku sandaha shishyathwa pradanaya kirime uthsawaye pradhana aaradhithaya lesa sahabhagi wemini.janadhipathi padawi prapthiya wenuwen janadhipathi lekam aramudalin pirinamana me shishyathwa mudale watinakama wasarakata ru. 6000 ki.thawaduratath adahas dak wu amathiwaraya meseda pawasiya.me rate ithihasaye ikuth dashaka thuna athulatha ape daruwange adhyapanaya gana honda wishwasayak thibune na.manussayaku, manussayeku wisin sakakarana yugayak thibune bas eke yaddi saka katayuthu parsalayak thibuna nam, saka katayuthu pudgalayaku ho kanthawak sitiya nam ee gana polisiyata ho an ayata danum diya yuthuya yana “padama” guruwarun wisin lamayinta kiya dunna.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithumage nayakathwayen sinhala muslim demala bargar siyalu jana kotaswalata biyen saken thorawa me rate oonama thanaka jiwath wiya haki aluth shri lankawak nirmanaya kirimata hakiyawak labuna.ee anuwa ada oonama sisu daruwakuta biyen saken thorawa uthurata nangenahirata dakunata adhyapana charikawak ho wandana gamanak ho thama mawbim wadagath sthana narambaimata ho yamata hakiyi.me rate wiwidha namwalin pasal warga thibenawa.
adi atak usathi, piyambaiya nohaki, me kurulu wisheshaya wathman kurullange aadimaya lesa salakiya haki yayi widyagnyayange adahasayi.

gayanaya: gunadasa kapuge samanga edwad jayakodi gi pada : rambaukana siddhartha himi rali palam sudu pawada nathiwath yana gamane le pallam thani mansala para kiyanne pilimallan kara pinnana amu sohone sangawa dinuwa da lowak - dinuwe da kumak man dinuwayi asuru sanin aswasumak labu obama hari balan gela harawa thanha ul hotak amora gijulihiniyan pilikanne holman karana smudura gan ho paraya oba wagiru minis leyin aparajitha minis lowak kawuruda labuwe sahas pahan silu dili ru kalu kambili anga porawa kanawala alla yanne akmul nathi gamanak do gi pada -ajantha ranasinha gayanaya- gunadasa kapuge hi sara wadunu pasuwa na ranga madala uruma kinduru kumariyani mata yanna awasarayi me raja andum walata ma aswasanu hakida kinduru kumaruwanane man thawama obage mayi mal pethi banda gelata randam palandawanna aganagarayata enna obata atha wanayi sandagiri pawwa miseka nuhuruyi aatha nuwara nupurudu depa biyen sali patalaweyi kamathe andura athara ennayi supiri lowata kamara widuli bubulu obata ingi marayi eethala walata misaka biya na kasi walata niliyaka nowe mema thawama kinduriyayi..
